about: Hi, I’m Rajendra Pratap, a passionate Frontend Developer with a strong focus on building scalable, user-centric web applications using React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, and Material UI. I specialize in creating seamless, responsive UIs with clean code and smooth user experiences. With 3.6+ years of industry experience, I thrive on solving real-world problems through code. Whether it’s building robust dashboards, integrating APIs, or ensuring pixel-perfect designs, I approach each project with curiosity, precision, and empathy for the end user. When I’m not coding, I enjoy exploring new design trends, mentoring aspiring developers, and learning the latest in AI and cloud technologies.
